name: Just Talk to Them
description:
Love can last a moment or a lifetime. But if you want to try and make it last, it's going to require some effort.

"What we obtain too cheap, we esteem too lightly: it is dearness only that gives everything its value." -Thomas Paine

--

My first foray into writing interactive fiction, experimenting with the format and trying to present a slightly different take on making choices. Shit yeah, approximately 5 minutes of plain text!

I wrote a substantial chunk of this at ChillJam 2016, hosted by GameDevSoc Edinburgh.

Created with Twine 2.0.11 and Harlowe 1.2.2.
